title: Technology & Innovation
part1: How often do you use technology?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of technology?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a piece of technology you find useful.
cue_card_points: and explain why you find it useful.

part3: How do you think technology will develop in the future?
What impact does technology have on education?
Do you think people rely too much on technology?
